page.title: 03Housing.New Estate.
page.content: A New Housing Estate in Newport. About nine years ago,when a large new factory opened at Howden,a few miles away from Newport,the work force needed local housing to avoid a long drive to work.So a site for sixty houses was prepared in Newport.This development is surrounded by ponds.The roads in the new estate are all named after water birds found on the local ponds,such as,Pochard Close and Grebe Road. The dwellings are semi-detatched houses and bungalows.Each house has a front and rear garden.This allows the children who live on this estate to keep pets such as rabbits,cats and dogs.There are some beautiful flowers in many of the gardens.Quite a few of the residents like to grow vegetables. Rosalyn Sell,Pochard Close,Newport.
